flawed_nl_solution:
Angela has 6+3*20=<<6+3*20=66>>66 plates.
Angela has 1/2*66=<<1/2*66=33>>33 cutlery.
Sharon wants to buy 1/2*20=<<1/2*20=40/1>>40/1 pots.
Sharon wants to buy 3*66-20=<<3*66-20=178>>178 plates.
Sharon wants to buy 2*33= <<2*33=66>>66 cutlery.
Sharon wants to buy a total of 40/1+178+66=<<40/1+178+66=284>>284 kitchen supplies.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 40/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
